kpi_info.title: Number of answered
kpi_info.use: The number of answers received to the VLR/SGSN authentication vector requests. These answers contain authentication vectors. If the number of requests is larger than the number of answers, the subscriber has not been created in the AC and the answer to the authentication vector request does not contain authentication vector. It is possible that the data on the subscriber's location in the ACUs has not yet been updated after the system has been restarted.
